attributes.action: Stop free NHS treatment for non UK residents/tax payers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I live abroad and have on some occasions been to A&E.I do not pay UK tax and do not live in the UK.

Why was I provided with free treatment?  I would have liked to have paid!  Reason: The NHS is not set up to accept payment from anyone.  

The NHS cannot be expected to treat every visitor for free.  When British citizens go abroad they buy health insurance.  Why does this not work the other way round?

Millions or even Billions could be saved here!  There are over 1 million expats alone never mind the foreigners who travel to UK for this free treatment.
